definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: So in the interest of helping out the next generation of thieves, I'm going to offer you a few pointers.
sentences.chinese: 所以，爲了有助於下一代遊蕩者們，我準備教你幾招。

sentences.english: We validated next generation radios for cars at General Motors.
sentences.chinese: 我們驗證了下一代車輛的無線廣播系統。

sentences.english: But the next generation is much better than our generation in this respect.
sentences.chinese: 但在這方面，下一代人將比我這一代人強很多。

sentences.english: It establishes the foundation for the next generation of client software.
sentences.chinese: 它們爲下一代客戶端軟件奠定了基礎。

sentences.english: Li Guangyao’s mother also invests her hopes in the next generation.
sentences.chinese: 李光耀的媽媽也在她的下一代上投資着她自己的夢想。

sentences.english: JTRS is the next generation of radios for the U.
sentences.chinese: JTRS是美國軍隊的下一代無線電。

sentences.english: So, the superstar we chose in the next generation is the last legal ANDROSTANE.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我們選擇的超級巨星在下一代是最後法律雄。

sentences.english: In the end, prospect of next generation GFS is presented.
sentences.chinese: 最後提出了對下一代全局文件系統的展望。

sentences.english: Master is also working hard for the next generation.
sentences.chinese: 師尊爲下一代努力工作。

sentences.english: He belongs to posterity as the instructor of future generations in the principles of liberty and freedom.
sentences.chinese: 他屬於作爲下一代人的自由理念的教育者的傳承人。

sentences.english: Packet-switching technology plays a critical role in next generation network.
sentences.chinese: 分組交換技術在下一代網絡中扮演了關鍵的角色。

sentences.english: To educate the young generation in such a way is just like making the rice shoots grow by pulling them up.
sentences.chinese: 用這種方法教育下一代無異於拔苗助長。

sentences.english: It is the next generation now in Pammal church.
sentences.chinese: 我們寄望巴瑪下一代的信徒能成爲教會的柱石。

sentences.english: Sure. If people are near in blood, they might pass on some genetic disease to the next generation.
sentences.chinese: 當然知道，近親結婚會給下一代帶來某些遺傳的疾病。

sentences.english: The official version of the new Next Generation console game from Ubisoft.
sentences.chinese: 官方版本的新的下一代控制檯遊戲從育碧軟件。

sentences.english: The ancient sages of China passed down a lot of wisdom in the form of proverbs.
sentences.chinese: 中國的古聖先賢用成語流傳很多智慧給下一代的人。

definition: to inherit/to succeed to (the throne etc)/to carry on (a tradition etc)
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
to pass on (to future generations)/passed on (from former times)/a continued tradition/an inheritance
because of/on the basis of/in view of/on account of
